rules_text:
Menace
When you salvage this card onto a creature or Vehicle you control, put a menace counter on that permanent.
Salvage {2}{B}{B} [i]({2}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature or Vehicle. Salvage only as a sorcery.)[/i]
